embeds.title: Thank you for creating a support post!
embeds.description:
Someone will hopefully arrive to assist you with your problem shortly. In the meantime, make sure you have added the following information to your issue (if applicable):

> • Ensure your problem hasn't already been covered in https://discord.com/channels/1180619962751144050/1183144975148527637 or another https://discord.com/channels/1180619962751144050/1180645679119470723 post.
> • Described the nature of your problem accurately.
> • Stated the version of the modpack you are playing on.
> • Declared any modifications you've made to the pack, such as new additions or mods you have disabled/removed (you can provide a modlist if applicable).
> • Provided a log for the session you encountered the issue in. Instructions on how to do this can be found [here](https://discord.com/channels/1180619962751144050/1183144975148527637/1191487176295317604).
 
If you have missed any of this information, feel free to add it now while waiting. Support members voluntarily help out, so don't expect an immediate response all of the time.

custom_tags.faq: Check out the https://discord.com/channels/1180619962751144050/1183144975148527637 to see common questions and answers the come through the server. If you’re unable to find your issue listed there, head over to https://discord.com/channels/1180619962751144050/1180645679119470723!
custom_tags.support: Head over to https://discord.com/channels/1180619962751144050/1180645679119470723 and create a ticket to get help with your issue. Issues posted in other channels are typically ignored.
custom_tags.no-monsters: If you’re not encountering enemies, make sure to follow all of the steps in this FAQ post: https://discord.com/channels/1180619962751144050/1183144975148527637/1192928687910297762
custom_tags.rollback: Need to roll-back to an earlier version of Lethal Company? Check out this FAQ post: https://discord.com/channels/1180619962751144050/1183144975148527637/1192236694922076180
custom_tags.wiki: View the official wiki for TheMostLethalCompany here: https://clarkuk.gitbook.io/themostlethalcompany-wiki/
custom_tags.installation: Check out this video on how to properly install TheMostLethalCompany using R2ModManager: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v-FLBO_vJW8
custom_tags.mismatch: If you receive an error while trying to connect to another user of the modpack, odds are you have a mismatched version with the host. Check out this FAQ post to better understand how to resolve this: https://discord.com/channels/1180619962751144050/1183144975148527637/1183256753828282368
custom_tags.moons: If you are considering adding custom moons to TMLC, please refer to this FAQ post: https://discord.com/channels/1180619962751144050/1183144975148527637/1192947994148999268
custom_tags.suggestion: If you have a suggestion for some content you’d like to see in the pack, head over to https://discord.com/channels/1180619962751144050/1188395063450017873. Please have a scroll/search before making a new post in there to make sure your suggestion doesn’t already exist.
custom_tags.pirated: Sorry, but (as per rule 5) we will not provide support for pirated (aka. cracked) versions of the game.
